pageTitle: New photo needed on an Oyster photocard
description: How to change your photo on your Oyster photocard if it has faded, is starting to fade, or your appearance has changed.

breadcrumbs.title: New photo needed on an Oyster photocard

title.title: New photo needed on an Oyster photocard

texts: {"template":"intro","texts":["You must change the photo on your Oyster photocard if it has faded or is starting to fade, or if your appearance has changed."],"link":{"image":{}},"image":{},"wrapped":false}
Your photocard might not be accepted for travel if your photo is not clear or no longer looks like you.
The photo should be a true likeness of you and show all your face. You should not be wearing anything that covers your head or face, unless it's consistently worn for medical or religious reasons.
You will need to pay a Â£10 admin fee.
